hero.coverImgAlt: Website cover image, presenting IT monitoring.
hero.title: Feeling overwhelmed by all your IT trend sources?
hero.content: Your personalized trends curator, designed to help you save time.

feature.title: An AI-powered tool to keep you perfectly informed
feature.content: Customize your email preferences to receive a newsletter tailored just for you!
feature.check1: Select the news topics you want to follow
feature.check2: Choose when you'd like to receive your news: daily, weekly, or on Fridays.
feature.check3: Select the sources to create your personalized newsletter.
feature.mailImgAlt: Picture of a sample email. Each news has a title and a brief descritpion made by the AI
feature.successEmail: Success! The email {{email}} has been registered and a welcome email has been sent.
feature.genericError: An error occurred while processing your request.

mail.txt:
